displayProperties.description: Defeat enemies in strike playlists using a subclass that matches the [Arc] / [Solar] / [Void] Day, collect Elemental Orbs of any type in the European Aerial Zone, and defeat minibosses in the European Aerial Zone.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Hood (Renewed)

sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2019 Solstice of Heroes event.
